query.description: e.g filter[email] : Search records by field
e.g filter[addedByUser.username] : Search records by relationship fields
e.g created_at : Sort data by field in asc order
e.g -created_at : Sort data by field in desc order, add dash (-) before field to sort in desc order
e.g fields[users] : id,username.email => get only given field in response
e.g include : addedByUser or include : addedByUser,updatedByUser get added relations into response

query.description: e.g filter[email] : Search records by field
e.g filter[addedByUser.username] : Search records by relationship fields
e.g created_at : Sort data by field in asc order
e.g -created_at : Sort data by field in desc order, add dash (-) before field to sort in desc order
e.g fields[users] : id,username.email => get only given field in response
e.g include : addedByUser or include : addedByUser,updatedByUser get added relations into response

query.description: e.g filter[email] : Search records by field
e.g filter[addedByUser.username] : Search records by relationship fields
e.g created_at : Sort data by field in asc order
e.g -created_at : Sort data by field in desc order, add dash (-) before field to sort in desc order
e.g fields[users] : id,username.email => get only given field in response
e.g include : addedByUser or include : addedByUser,updatedByUser get added relations into response

query.description: e.g filter[email] : Search records by field
e.g filter[addedByUser.username] : Search records by relationship fields
e.g created_at : Sort data by field in asc order
e.g -created_at : Sort data by field in desc order, add dash (-) before field to sort in desc order
e.g fields[users] : id,username.email => get only given field in response
e.g include : addedByUser or include : addedByUser,updatedByUser get added relations into response
